pro.ghosh.sudipto.complexNumber

Class Complex

  • java.lang.Object
    • pro.ghosh.sudipto.complexNumber.Complex

  • public class Complex
extends java.lang.Object
    Design a class Complex having a real part (x) and an imaginary part (y). Provide methods to perform the following on complex numbers: - Add two complex numbers - Multiply two complex numbers - toString() method to display complex numbers in the form: x + i y
    Author:
    sudipto@ghosh.pro University of Delhu
